data.name: Aim Lab Signature Series - HusKerrs
data.detailed_description:
Think of it as an investment. HusKerrs is one of the top earners from prize earnings in Call of Duty Warzone. Now you can channel your inner HusKerrs while training in style for your next prize tournament, or bragging rights for the top spot on squad's leaderboard. Collaboratively designed by HusKerrs and Mr. Aim Lab.

DLC includes:
R4 -C ‘HusKerrs’ Skin

About HusKerrs
Jordan 'HusKerrs' Thomas started his streaming career as an H1Z1 pro player in 2017 before transitioning to competitive Apex Legends for team Rogue. Today, he is one of the most influential and talented Call of Duty Warzone streamers on Twitch. HusKerrs is the 2nd highest player in total prize earnings from CoD: Warzone tournaments, and continues to consistently place amongst the top players on leaderboards in each tournament that he participates in.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 and up
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
